update in class NotifiableTextArea
update 
 void update()
This is the update() that the AccountDisplay and OrdBookDisplay classes use to do their things. It'll get called when we click inside the TickerDisplay, but nothing should happen (because the thing gets updated automatically anyway).

Overrides:
